column4: At present I'm not at the mac.. but I have a mac with a blank harddrive, and no OS X disks. I want to install Ubuntu 10.04 on it. Anything in particular I'll need to do?
Blocky: PulseAudio.. despite how much trouble PulseAudio causes, if everything uses it, things tend to work better.
I'm having a hell of a time trying to hear anything at all through my TOSLINK SPDIF
don't know much about spdif, but I know that conflicts with alsa can horribly distort audio, and using pulseaudio usually avoids that.
